review: Love this. I had a first edition Samsung Smart DVD player, and it was doing a little worse for wear lately. Slow, and had serious performance issues with apps. Upgraded to this and I like it so far. Only issues is that it has problems connecting to my Wi-Fi router one room away. It has to buffer a lot. Im sure it will be fine once I move the router into the same room. Other than that, very quick to navigate.
